attributes.action: Reduce fuel duty when VAT is increased back to 17.5%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When VAT was reduced to 15% the Chancellor sneakily added duty to fuel to ensure the cost of a litre did not decrease, when VAT is increased back to 17.5% the Prime Minister must ensure that this added duty is removed to ensure the overall tax levels on fuel do not rise.The motoring public are being bled dry with fuel tax and can not and should not pay another stealth tax on their mobility
